product_name: The North Face Rockcam Resolve Rain Jacket - Boys'
long_description: Mesh-lined, waterproof, breathable and fully seam-sealed, The North Face Rockcam Resolve Rain Jacket for boys is equipped for play in the worst weather. Zippered hand pockets; center front zip and rip-and-stick closure; elasticized cuffs; chin guard flap. ID label; embroidered logo at left chest and back right shoulder. The North Face Rockcam Resolve Rain Jacket features a brushed collar lining and a hood that stows in the collar.
short_description: Mesh-lined, waterproof, breathable and fully seam-sealed, The North Face Rockcam Resolve Rain Jacket for boys is equipped for play in the worst weather.
